summary: A more robust and durable-looking "heavy" shield for the Shield of Solitude
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/mods/110/images/23843-1-1384282294.png[/img]


Author: MadCat221 (MadCat221@gmail.com)

Version: 1

SEPTEMBER 8, 2012

1. Introduction
2: Installation
3. Version History

===============
1. INTRODUCTION
===============

This mod replaces the model used for the Shield of Solitude with one made up of a chopped up Steel shield to make it look cleaner and sturdier like a heavy shield should.  Stats are unchanged.  The shield issued to the Solitude guardsmen is also unchanged.

I made the change for two reasons: First, it's a heavy shield using the mesh meant for a class of shields that are light.  Secondly, why would the reward for thwarting the Wolf Queen herself be a dinky iron and cheap wood board?

This should be compatible with any Steel Shield texture replacers (such as aMidianBorn).

===============
2. INSTALLATION
===============

Unpack the SteelShieldofSolitude.esp module and Meshes folder into your Skyrim\Data folder, or use Nexus Mod Manager to square it away for you.  Activate the module.


==================
3. VERSION HISTORY
==================

v1: 
Initial Release.
